original_name: The Adventures of Super Mario Bros. 3
plot: The series continues the adventures of Kevin and his friends in Videoland and the Super Mario Bros. in the Mushroom Kingdom.
plot_en: The series continues the adventures of Kevin and his friends in Videoland and the Super Mario Bros. in the Mushroom Kingdom.
plot_es: The series continues the adventures of Kevin and his friends in Videoland and the Super Mario Bros. in the Mushroom Kingdom.
title: Las Aventuras de los Hermanos Super Mario
